alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County near Young southeast of Payson through 245 PM MST... At 220 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Young, or 21 miles southwest of Forest Lakes, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Young. This includes State Route 288 between mile markers 291 and 309. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
